name: SyncForkWithUpstream
description:
Sync a forked repository's branch with the upstream repo.

Use this tool to update a branch of a forked GitHub repository, ensuring it is up-to-date with changes from the upstream repository.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. Not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository to update. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: branch_name_to_sync
parameters.description: The name of the branch in the forked repository to update with upstream changes.

value_schema.description: The name of the branch which should be updated to match upstream.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: The name of the branch which should be updated to match upstream.

value_schema.description: The name of the branch which should be updated to match upstream.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
